If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef PROCESSING_UNIT_INTERFACE_H 33 #define PROCESSING_UNIT_INTERFACE_H 34 35 #include "data.h" 42 class ProcessingUnitInterface { 43 public: 48 virtual void Start(void ** = nullptr) = 0; 49 57 virtual void Run(void *data) = 0; 58 63 virtual void Delete() = 0; 64 71 virtual ProcessingUnitInterface *Clone() { return nullptr; }; 72 }; 73 74 #endif
